comment.author: 26665203@N08
comment._content: I can only imagine how beautifully striking the fabric in those outfits would have been.  Perhaps the lady second from right is wearing a deep navy blue satin dress.  The lady in front is wearing perhaps a deep burgundy.

comment.author: 92444803@N00
comment._content: The staggered position of each family member haves your eye a chance to look at each person their wonderful clothes. I can see the dark colored hues of burgundy and dark blue. Nice comment oregono1.
